name: Acres (itch)
description:
Twigz, a scarecrow-like creature, worshiped by a farming village as a protector of their harvest, is enraged as said village is burned to the ground by pillaging undead crow-people. Now she is trying to get vengeance on the raiders while planting new crops to return the acres to their former glory.

By uniquely combining the two genres of Hack'n'Slash and Buildup Strategy, we want to make the player feel like they are the last standing bastion in a never-ending battle against overwhelming amounts of enemies, protecting the village's remains from complete annihilation and therefore conveying the message never to give up.
